stepTitle:
Consider the following reaction:

2NO(g) + $$\operatorname{O_2}\left(gight)$$ ⇌ $$2\operatorname{NO_2}\left(gight)$$

Given that the change in enthalpy (ΔH) for this reaction is $$-114$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$ and the change in entropy (ΔS) is $$-146$$ $$ rac{J}{mol·K}$$, at what temperature(s) is this reaction spontaneous?
